name: Case of the Dead Pirate
completionText: Congratulations! You discovered the murderer! Probably. You can talk to the crew on the island to see if you were right. You spent the remaining time at sea learning from the pirate crew.
Description: A pirate ship in Uragota is willing to take travellers across the sea, if they have a destination in mind. What could go wrong?

flags.name: Quest Start
flags.description: Captain Nobeard has agreed to take you on his boat to the island on Mound's Map, for a price.

flags.name: Price Paid
flags.description: You paid Captain Nobeard the 100 gold coins he requested. You can board the ship now.

flags.name: Fremp and Jack Suspect
flags.description: Talking to Dr. Squid revealed that First Mate Fremp and Two Legs Jack didn't vote for Nobeard. Maybe it was one of them?

flags.name: Fremp Accuses Jack
flags.description: Fremp said Two Legs Jack was captain before Nobeard and was voted off the captain's seat.

flags.name: Fremp Refuses Search
flags.description: Fremp refused a search of his bunk. Maybe you could distract him with some help from another crewmember...

flags.name: Jack Searched Fremp's Bunk
flags.description: By distracting Fremp with juggling questions, Jack was able to search his bunk.

flags.name: Fremp Accused
flags.description: After confronting him with the murder weapon, Fremp is adamant it wasn't him. He claims Jack set him up.

flags.name: Nobeard Is Dead!
flags.description: In the night someone on board killed Captain Nobeard.

flags.name: You've Got The Case
flags.description: As the only sober person on the ship, Quartermaster Argon has asked you to solve the mystery.

flags.name: Fremp Confronted
flags.description: After confronting him with the murder weapon, Fremp is adamant it wasn't him. He claims Jack set him up.

flags.name: Jack's Aliby
flags.description: A crewmate has revealed Jack was with his band at the time of the murder.

flags.name: Jack's Plan
flags.description: Jack has offered to search Fremp's bunk for you if you can distract him.

flags.name: Investigation Begun
flags.description: You've set to work trying to solve the murder. You can talk to everyone aboard and see what you can come up with.

flags.name: Fremp Accused
flags.description: You accused First Mate Fremp of the murder.

flags.name: Argon Accused
flags.description: You accused Quartermaster Argon of the murder.

flags.name: Two Legs Jack Accused
flags.description: You accused Two Legs Jack of the murder.

flags.name: Dr. Squid Accused
flags.description: You accused Doctor Squid of the murder.

flags.name: Confessed
flags.description: For some reason you confessed to the murder.

flags.name: Fremp Thrown Overboard
flags.description: The pirates threw Fremp overboard.

flags.name: Argon Thrown Overboard
flags.description: The pirates threw Quartermaster Argon overboard.

flags.name: Two Legs Jack Thrown Overboard
flags.description: The pirates threw Two Legs Jack overboard.

flags.name: Dr. Squid Thrown Overboard
flags.description: The pirates threw Doctor Squid overboard.

flags.name: Thrown Overboard
flags.description: The pirates threw you overboard and you drowned.
